text: However, every slave bought for money you will circumcise; then he may eat of it.

At that time men were appointed over the chambers set aside for stores, offerings, first fruits, and tithes; in them they were to collect from the fields of the various cities the portions legally assigned to the priests and Levites. For Judah rejoiced in its appointed priests and Levites
Then he said to Jonathan: “Why have you put all these people to so much trouble when we are not at war?
for if he were not expecting the fallen to rise again, it would have been superfluous and foolish to pray for the dead.
Then it says, ‘I will return to my home from which I came.’ But upon returning, it finds it empty, swept clean, and put in order.
For they have all contributed from their surplus wealth, but she, from her poverty, has contributed all she had, her whole livelihood.”
Truly, I say to you, he will put him in charge of all his property.
Recapitulation. Jesus cried out and said, “Whoever believes in me believes not only in me but also in the one who sent me,
